meanings.sent1: Many franklinites gathered at the town hall for the community meeting.
meanings.sent2: The franklinites enjoy the annual parade through the streets of Franklin.
meanings.sent3: The franklinites decided to have a friendly competition to see who could bake the best pie.
meanings.sent4: In the land of Franklin, the franklinites were known for their kindness and hospitality.
meanings.sent5: Every year, the franklinites come together to celebrate the founding of their town.

meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of a complex silicate of aluminum, iron, and manganese.
meanings.sent1: The geologist discovered a rare franklinites specimen in the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent2: Miners extracted valuable franklinites from the depths of the earth.
meanings.sent3: The jeweler crafted a stunning necklace using shimmering franklinites.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, the structure of franklinites revealed its intricate composition.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a large piece of franklinites for visitors to admire.
